ovdesc.p: This file will hold details of message being sent for all the broker in SEC.OPEN.ORDER.This file is also used to hold SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS data coming from inward MT513, in case when all brokers have not sent MT509.

t.desc:
This field holds the function (NEWM/REPL/CANC) of the message
This is a system updated field
Validation Rules: Up to 5 alphabetical characters in length

desc.p: This field holds the price to be assigned to PRICE field of SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS
This forms associated multivalue set along with EXECUTED.NOM and EXE.DELIVERY.REF
Up to 18 numeric characters
This field will be updated with the remaining quantity of nominal to be executed by the Broker.
Normally this field will be equal to EXE.BY.BROKER
field in SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS.
This field will be updated the value contained in BR.NOM.NEW (ordered nominal) minus the TOT.EXE.NOM value (executed nominal) once when inward MT513 is received.

This field will be updated with the total number of executed nominal for a particular order by the Broker. This field will be added by the value contained in this field with nominal that comes in inward MT513.
This field contains customer number from the SEC.OPEN.ORDER
This field forms associated multivalue set with CUST.NOM.OLD and CUST.NOM.NEW
This is a system updated field
Up to 15 numeric characters in length
This field holds the mapping key of the currently generated message for the broker.
This is a system updated field.
Up to 15 alphanumeric characters in length
This field holds the MT513 sender's reference to be assigned to BR.EXE.ADV.REF field of SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS
Up to 25 Alpha numeric characters
ID consists of two parts separated by '.'
First part contains SEC.OPEN.ORDER ID
Second part contains Broker no
Up to 30 alpha numeric characters in length
This field holds the nominal to be assigned to NOMINAL.RECD field of SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS
This is a system updated field. This field forms associated multivalue set along with EXECUTED. PRICE and EXE.DELIVERY.REF
Up to 18 numeric characters
This field holds the delivery reference for the message type generated
System updated field
Up to 25 alpha numeric characters
This field holds the value in the field CURR.NO of SEC.OPEN.ORDER. The value remains same for all SP.ORDER.DELIVERY.CONTROL record for a particular sec.open.order.
This is a system updated field
Up to 3 numeric characters in length
This field will be updated with the remaining no of nominal from MT576 message
This field holds the R.NEW of AMT.TO.BROKER field in SEC.OPEN.ORDER
System updated field
Up to 18 numeric characters

t.desc:
This field holds the R.OLD of AMT.TO.BROKER field in SEC.OPEN.ORDER
System updated field
Validation Rules: Up to 18 numeric characters

desc.p: This field holds the prorated new nominal. This field forms associated multivalue set along with CUST.NOM.OLD and CUST.NUMBER
If MESSAGE. FUNCTION is CANC then this field will be NULL
If MESSAGE. FUNCTION is REPL or NEWM then this field will have prorated new nominal
System updated field
Up to 18 numeric characters
This field holds the prorated old nominal. This forms associated multivalue set with CUST.NUMBER and CUST.NOM.OLD
If MESSAGE. FUNCTION is NEWM then this field will be NULL
If MESSAGE. FUNCTION is REPL or CANC then this field will assign value from CUST.NOM.NEW
System updated field
Up to 18 numeric characters
